mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:= @rownum +1 rownum, member_id, member_name, member_sex, member_phone, member_email, member_height, member_top_size, member_bottom_size, member_shoes_size, member_face, member_reg_date, member_grade, member_status FROM member WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0 limit 0, #{limitMax}

SELECT member_id, member_name, member_sex, member_phone, member_email, member_height, member_top_size, member_bottom_size, member_shoes_size, member_face, member_reg_date, member_grade, member_status FROM member WHERE #{member_id} = member_id
